contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Italian comune | name = Zermeghedo | official_name = Comune di Zermeghedo | native_name = | image_skyline = | imagesize = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_shield = Zermeghedo-Stemma.gif | shield_alt = | shield_size = px | image_map = | map_alt = | map_caption = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | latd = 45 |latm = 29 |lats = |latNS = N | longd = 11 |longm = 22 |longs = |longEW = E | coordinates_type = | coordinates_display = title | coordinates_footnotes = | region = [[Veneto]] | province = [[Province of Vicenza|Vicenza]] (VI) | frazioni = | mayor_party = | mayor = Giuseppe Castaman | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 2 | population_footnotes = | population_total = 1351 | population_as_of = February 28, 2007 | pop_density_footnotes = | population_demonym = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | twin1 = | twin1_country = | saint = | day = | postal_code = 36050 | area_code = 0444 | website = {{official|http://www.comune.zermeghedo.vi.it}} | footnotes = }}'''Zermeghedo''' is a town and ''[[comune]]'' in the [[province of Vicenza]], [[Veneto]], [[Italy]]. It is west of SP31. Because of its area, Zermeghedo is the smallest comune in Veneto (though [[Laghi]], the less inhabited comune is also informally known as "the smallest" one). ==Sources== *[http://maps.google.com/maphp?hl=en&ned=us&tab=nl&q=Zermeghedo,%20Italy (Google Maps)] {{Province of Vicenza}} [[Category:Cities and towns in Veneto]] {{Veneto-geo-stub}}
